TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAttributeStatement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement

Docs.summary: Contains a set of attributes associated with a particular .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement> 类对应于 OASIS SAML 1.1 规范中定义的 `<saml:AttributeStatement>` XML 元素。
SamlSecurityToken 安全令牌的声明包含在 SAML 语句中，而这些语句又包含在 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> 中。 其中一个语句为 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement>，它将一组任意声明绑定到特定的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject>。 这些声明被表示为 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute> 集合，并存储在 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.Attributes%2A> 属性中。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject samlSubject, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute> attributes) cil managed

Docs.param: A that specifies the subject of the claim.
An of type that contains a set of attributes associated with the subject.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified subject and set of attributes associated with the subject.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表指定了此构造函数的参数所设置的属性。
|属性|参数| |--------------|---------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.Attributes%2A>|`Attributes`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject%2A>|`samlSubject`|

Docs.exception: contains a member that is . -or- contains zero members.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddClaimsToList(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> claims) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddClaimsToList (claims As IList(Of Claim))

Docs.param: An of type that contains the set of claims to add to the SAML statement.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified set of claims as attributes to this SAML statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> 方法将一组声明转换为 SAML 断言的属性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Attributes As IList(Of SamlAttribute)

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of attributes associated with the subject of the SAML assertion.
Docs.value: 一个类型为 的 ，它包含一组与主题关联的属性。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每个 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute> 都可包含多个属性值。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.Attributes%2A> 集合中的每个成员都与 OASIS SAML 的断言和协议规范中定义的 `<saml:Attribute>` 元素相对应。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
Docs.value: 如果此实例的属性是只读的，则为 ；否则为 。 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement> 类的此实例设为只读，请调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MakeReadOnly() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes this instance to be read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法时，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 属性被设置为 `true`，并且不能再设置此实例的属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.ReadXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> 方法设置 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.Attributes%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject%2A> 属性。
